name: df-fib
body: |- wceq(cfib, co(cs2(nat0, nat1), csseq, cmpt(s0, cin(cword(cn0), cima(ccnv(chash), cfv(cuz, nat2))), co(cfv(cv(s0), co(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cmin, nat2)), caddc, cfv(cv(s0), co(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cmin, nat1))))))
comment: Define the Fibonacci sequence, where that each element is the sum of the two preceding ones, starting from 0 and 1. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Apr-2019.)
